item.title: Learn Home Automation
item.description:
With a decade of experience in software design and development, I have consistently leveraged technology to enhance productivity and improve processes for many organizations and end-users.

I want to use my knowledge and experience to reduce stress and bring joy to our homes, by empowering enthusiasts with the tools and knowledge to design personalized home automation systems.

Click here to learn more.

item.title: The Greek Philosopher App
item.description:
The Greek Philosopher app gathers more than six hundred of the best words of wisdom from the major schools of Greek thought. Based on original sources, this work is a compilation of carefully selected quotes spanning from the 6th Century BC to 1st Century AD. It offers guidance and motivation for a life well lived.

Available here.
